item.title: VCS Ubuntu Docker
item.content:encoded:
VCS Ubuntu Docker

sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl gnupg-agent software-properties-common
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add -
sudo apt-key fingerprint 0EBFCD88
sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable"
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
sudo adduser ubuntu docker

relogin // or run newgrp docker

docker ps

from https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/ubuntu/

item.title: LinuxDebian
item.content:encoded:
同步設定

webdav = https://www.libthomas.org/nextcloud/remote.php/webdav/Joplin

sandbox permission error

https://github.com/laurent22/joplin/issues/2246

    ./Joplin.AppImage --appimage-extract
    sudo chown root chrome-sandbox
    sudo chmod 4755 chrome-sandbox
    ln -s /home/thomas/.joplin/squashfs-root/joplin ~/bin/joplin
